content: 2019 Singaporean comedy filmThis article **needs a plot summary.** Please add one in your own words. *(July 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* ***Make It Big Big*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 玉建煌崇大件事) is a 2019 Singaporean comedy film directed by [Mark Lee](/wiki/Mark_Lee_(Singaporean_actor)) in his feature directorial debut. The film stars Lee, [Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew), [Marcus Chin](/wiki/Marcus_Chin) and Chen Biyu. The film was released on 3 January 2019 and revolves around the daily lives of the four radio presenters of [Love 972](/wiki/Love_972) "The Breakfast Quartet" show. The film also features cameo appearances by Singaporean and overseas entertainers and DJs from LOVE 97.2FM. It debuted in fourth place on the box office chart in Singapore. ## Cast - [Mark Lee](/wiki/Mark_Lee_(Singaporean_actor)) as himself - [Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew) as himself - [Marcus Chin](/wiki/Marcus_Chin) as himself - Chen Biyu as herself The film also featured many cameo appearances including [Zoe Tay](/wiki/Zoe_Tay), [Christopher Lee](/wiki/Christopher_Lee_(Malaysian_actor)), [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong), [Chew Chor Meng](/wiki/Chew_Chor_Meng), [Jack Neo](/wiki/Jack_Neo), [Henry Thia](/wiki/Henry_Thia), [Guo Liang](/wiki/Guo_Liang_(actor)), [You Yi](/wiki/Youyi_(actress)), and [Chapman To](/wiki/Chapman_To). - *Make It Big Big* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Make It Big Big
